price: Kisha tukakufanyeni nyiye ndio wenye kushika mahala pao baada yao katika ardhi ili tuone jinsi mtakavyo tenda.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Enyi Umma wa Muhammad! Tumekujaalieni muwe makhalifa wa ardhi, mshike pahala pa walio kutangulieni, ili tukujaribuni tudhihirishe mtacho kikhiari, ut'iifu au uasi, baada ya mlivyo kwisha jua yaliyo wapata walio kutangulieni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnākum khalāifa fī al-arḍi min baʿdihim linanẓura kayfa taʿmalūna
